member.content.edit content_featured_lis.html: If you select Yes, no other page on the site can be used to create new listings. This will add an "Add Listing" link to the Real Estate manager menu to simplify adding listings.
member.content.edit content_featured_lis.label: Featured listing page?

member.content.edit content_parent_id.html: Selecting a Parent page will automatically link the 2 pages together. This automates building some of the navigation throughout the website. Associates this page with another page.
member.content.edit content_parent_id.label: Change Parent Page

member.blog.edit rss_story.html: The meat of the page, where all of the information and text is placed. Editable content in this large text field.
member.blog.edit rss_story.label: Body Text

member.member.edit member_photo.html: Simply a photo on the visible page. Click CHOOSE FILE, to browse your files for the photo you want on the page.

member.slideshow.edit slideshow_locked.label: Lock slideshow?

member.blog.formcat rss_category_metades.label: Meta Description

member.content.edit content_image_captio.html: The information placed under/ over the photo, used to describe the photo in detail. Enter in a text field*
member.content.edit content_image_captio.label: Photo 1 Caption

member.blog.formcat rss_category_metakey.label: Meta Keywords

member.blog.editTag rss_tag_unique_name.html: FOR ADVANCED USERS, this is a field that lets you override the URL. ie... /mycustompage.html. Note: there is no other URL format supported. You must start with a forward slash and cannot contain any special characters. We advise not using this because you can accidently break your website.
member.blog.editTag rss_tag_unique_name.label: Unique URL

member.content.edit content_text.html: The meat of the page, where all of the information and text is placed. Editable content in this large text field.
member.content.edit content_text.label: Body Column 1

member.rental.category.edit rental_categ.label: Meta Description

member.content.edit content_metatitle.html: Meta title is optional and overrides the <TITLE> HTML element to be different from the visible page title.
member.content.edit content_metatitle.label: META Title

member.content.edit content_hide_link.html: Hides/ removes the link from the site completely. This is useful for password protected pages or other pages that are not designed to be visited directly.
member.content.edit content_hide_link.label: Hide Link?

member.blog.edit rss_unique_name.html: FOR ADVANCED USERS, this is a field that lets you override the URL. ie... /mycustompage.html. Note: there is no other URL format supported. You must start with a forward slash and cannot contain any special characters. We advise not using this because you can accidently break your website.
member.blog.edit rss_unique_name.label: Unique URL

member.member.edit member_public_profile.html: Click yes to make this member visible on other public agents' sites.

member.content.edit content_html_text.html: ADVANCED USERS ONLY! Please put only Complex Javascript HTML Code in the large text field shown. This is useful for embedding javascript, maps, videos, and flash widgets without the editor breaking / filtering the content. This information will appear at the top of the page.
member.content.edit content_html_text.label:
Insert
Advanced Code

This tool lets you upload multiple images (.jpg, .gif or .png) at once.
You may also upload a compressed zip file with these image formats inside.
Please note any files inside the zip, that are not jpg, gif or png, , will be ignored.
